strategy: Coral produce calcified fronds with distinct joints to be flexible in wave-exposed habitats.
mechanism: producing calcified fronds with distinct joints

strategy: Algae resist fatigue by having a joint structure that lacks transverse connections.

animals rely on hydrostatic skeletons for support, movement, muscular antagonism, and the amplification of the force and displacement of muscle contraction by using internal pressure to control the various dimensions
